scripts.build: browserify js/main.js -o compiled/bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] --plugins [ transform-class-properties transform-object-rest-spread ] ]
scripts.watch: watchify js/main.js -o compiled/bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] --plugins [ transform-class-properties transform-object-rest-spread ] ]
